The video circulating on social media sh: 2. The video was uploaded on March 24, 2020, and its description mentions "Lockdown/Curfew in Rajkamal Chowk, Amravati || Police beating people one by one."
By examining the video: it is observed that at the 22nd second, the board of 'Assam Tea Center' can be seen, confirming that the video was indeed shot in Amravati.
A report from Lokmat on March 23: 2020, mentioned a lockdown in Amravati, indicating that a video of police beating people during the lockdown last year is being shared as recent after fresh COVID norms were imposed in Maharashtra.
